p:
A tabular form of the O-O interaction is used. The coefficients used in the O-O interactions are: a
ij = 11272.6, b
ij = 0.1363, c
ij = 134.0, a 0 = 42.891698, a 1 = −55.496542, a 2 = 23.077359, a 3 = −3.131396, b 0 = 479.955282, b 1 = −1372.530359, b 2 = 1562.223303, b 3 = −881.968518, b 4 = 246.434690, b 5 = −27.244725. The numbers given here are in more numerical precision than the parameters published in ref.
34 , however, found necessary to construct the potential accurately. In addition, a cutoff radius of 12.001 Å is used for the Morelon empirical potential
28 .
